page.title: 09WALTHAM ABBEY TOWN HALL
page.content:
A group of children from class 4R, went to the Town Hall on 27th June 1985. They found out a lot about its history and its function today.
The town hall was built in{1906,}so it is{79 years old.}It has over 20 rooms.
Within the Town Hall is a{computer room where the local{lottery}is drawn each week (at random). This room also has the charts for the local cemetery and garden of rest. There are also store rooms where the paper and Christmas decorations are kept. A few years ago there was a{fire}in the town hall,which started where the decorations are kept.Luckily the building wasn't badly damaged. Some people who work in the building believe its{haunted!
